Motherson Sumi Wiring India Ltd. (MSUMI) witnessed a 26% rise in its share price during May 2025. This surge contributed to a notable recovery from a 37% drop experienced between June 2024 and February 2025.

In other news from May 2025, the company's board recommended a final dividend of ₹0.35 per share on May 9, 2025, supplementing the interim dividend of ₹0.50 for FY 2024-25. This dividend was contingent on shareholder approval at the AGM in August 2025, with a record date of June 23, 2025. Also on May 9, 2025, Motherson Sumi Wiring India Ltd. released its Q4 FY25 and full-year results, reporting record revenue and EBITDA with YoY revenue growth of 7.1% for Q4 and 8.8% for the full year. The company also announced a bonus issue of 1 equity share for every 2 existing shares on May 29, 2025, with a record date of July 18, 2025.
